job_description:
Key responsibilities:



1. Develop modular production-grade AI agents using Python

2. Integrate with agent frameworks like Crew AI, OpenAI Agent SDK, or Google ADK

4. Debug and optimize agent performance in real-time scenarios

5. Assist in cloud-based deployment and API integrations

2. Familiarity with agent frameworks such as Crew AI, OpenAI Agent SDK, or Google ADK

3. Solid understanding of software engineering principles

4. Passion for building autonomous systems

job_description:
Key responsibilities:



1. Build, maintain, and optimize backend systems and RESTful/GraphQL APIs using Next.js (API routes), Node.js, and Express.js

2. Integrate with relational and NoSQL databases including PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and Redis

3. Implement authentication, session management, and robust security best practices

4. Collaborate with front-end teams using React.js and Next.js for SSR/SSG with state management through Redux or Context API

5. Develop and deploy end-to-end features connecting frontend UI, backend logic, and database layers

6. Work with Python and ML frameworks such as scikit-learn, TensorFlow, PyTorch, spaCy, and NLTK

7. Design and integrate ML/NLP models via REST APIs or direct Python-Node.js bindings using child\_process or gRPC

8. Assist in building chatbots, recommendation engines, or language analysis modules as part of product features

9. Deploy, monitor, and scale applications on AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda), Google Cloud, or Vercel

10. Use Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD pipelines including Jenkins and GitHub Actions for automation and smooth releases

11. Write unit and integration tests for API endpoints and business logic using Jest, Mocha, and Supertest

12. Document backend architecture, API specifications (OpenAPI/Swagger), and model integration details

13. Participate in agile sprints, code reviews, and daily stand-ups using Slack, Jira, Notion, and Trello

14. Share progress, highlight blockers, and collaborate closely with cross-functional teams



Requirements:



1. Hold a BTech, MTech, MCA, or a related degree (students or recent graduates)

2. Demonstrate proficiency in Node.js, Next.js (API/backend), and JavaScript/TypeScript

3. Have experience with backend/database systems and developing REST/GraphQL APIs with basic frontend knowledge

4. Show familiarity with Python and at least one ML/AI/NLP framework

5. Possess strong analytical skills and a collaborative mindset with enthusiasm for working on AI-driven web products

6. Display strong communication and documentation abilities



Tool/Technologies:



1. Backend/API: Next.js (API routes), Node.js, Express.js, REST, GraphQL

2. Full Stack: React.js, Next.js, Redux/Context API, SCSS/CSS Modules

3. Database: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis

4. ML/AI/NLP: Python, scikit-learn, TensorFlow, PyTorch, NLTK, spaCy

5. Cloud/DevOps: AWS, Google Cloud, Vercel, Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, GitHub Actions

6. Security/Auth: JWT, OAuth, Auth0, best practices for API/DB security

7. Version Control: Git, GitHub, GitLab

8. Testing: Jest, Mocha, Supertest

9. Collaboration: Slack, Jira, Notion, Trello



Location:C-84, Sector 2, Noida - 201301 (Near Sector 15 Metro Station)

company_about: URE Legal Advocates, founded in 1999, is a law firm specializing in corporate international tax, transfer pricing, GST, customs & trade, insolvency & bankruptcy code, SARFAESI, RDB Act, and MCS Act, with expertise in policy, disputes, and transaction advisory. We provide consulting services on tax litigation, tax investigations, and alternate dispute resolution (APA, MAP, and advance ruling), as well as civil litigation and white-collar crimes, while also acting as expert witnesses on treaty and transfer pricing law. Our senior partners offer strategic insights and legal advice on complex legal and tax matters, including pre-litigation and litigation support, representing clients before authorities such as ITAT, CBDT, CBIC, the Directorate of Revenue Intelligence (DRI), Central Bureau of Investigation (CBI), the Directorate of Enforcement (ED), DRT, and DRAT. Dostartup.in, urehr.com, and Ytpr.in also operate under URE Consulting LLP.

job_description:
Are you a talented machine learning enthusiast with a strong foundation in Python? As a machine learning intern at Optimspace, you will have the opportunity to collaborate with experienced professionals and gain valuable hands-on experience in leveraging advanced algorithms to drive innovation and success. 



Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

3. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to enhance data-driven decision making

4. Research and experiment with new machine learning techniques for continuous improvement

5. Assist in data preprocessing, feature engineering, and model evaluation

6. Support the development of scalable machine learning pipelines

7. Stay updated on industry trends and best practices to contribute fresh ideas and perspectives



If you are passionate about machine learning and eager to make a significant impact, apply now to join Optimspace as a machine learning intern!

job_description:
Are you looking for a dynamic opportunity to develop business strategies, enhance outreach, and drive revenue growth while making a real social impact? Join Pawzz as a business development intern, where you will play a crucial role in fundraising, donor engagement, and campaign marketing to support stray animals. This internship will not only enhance your resume with a letter of recommendation but also help you develop key skills in sales, networking, revenue generation, and market expansion. As a business development intern, you will leverage available resources while identifying new growth opportunities, ensuring both personal and organizational success. 



Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:



1. Attract donors and sponsors through strategic networking and outreach campaigns.

2. Utilize social media, WhatsApp, LinkedIn, email, and calls to build relationships with potential supporters.

3. Create compelling marketing pitches and fundraising messages to drive donations.

4. Identify and develop new partnerships with individuals, corporations, and organizations to expand revenue streams.



This internship is a perfect opportunity to develop essential business skills, build a strong professional network, and create a lasting impact. If you're ready to drive change while growing professionally, apply now!

company_about: Pawzz is an upcoming aggregation platform in animal welfare for rescuers and non-profit organizations. We raise awareness about issues related to animal cruelty while simultaneously providing a platform for animal lovers to volunteer, adopt animals, fund campaigns, post-rescue stories, and become a vital part of the movement aiming for the complete eradication of the stigma towards animals in our society. Our mission is to balance out the human-animal ecosystem in the country and ensure that both live in harmony with each other.

company_about: SN Mentoring is a happiness-focused career consulting organization. We invest time to carve out a career path that should ultimately lead to happiness for you. Because if one does what one loves, then one is happy! We are a career and education guidance organization built on expertise, experience, and results where passionate mentors bring out the best in you. We provide highly customized career development services. We work on the scientific career counseling processes developed by Saurabh Nanda, who has dedicated his life to revealing career decision-making influencers.
